header.navBarHeading: is now available on Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox

first.heading: Co-watch Disney with your favorite people, anytime, anywhere!
first.html:
Disney is more fun with friends and family. Then why watch it alone? Now you can watch Disney with your favorite people while staying anywhere across the world. Install the Disney Plus Party extension and have online watch parties in perfect sync!

Moreover, Disney Plus even offers GroupWatch, which allows users worldwide to enjoy shows, series, and movies with friends and family. Don’t worry; even Apple users can use SharePlay for this. And to make your Disney Plus Group Watch special, you can use its feature. Its features provide seamless viewing, allowing continuous playback and control over rewinding, pausing, and fast-forwarding. Therefore, here are guidelines for setting up these features are available below. Note that Disney Plus Group Watch is currently in the US. But iPhone and iPad users can enjoy Disney+ with friends through SharePlay.

second.heading: How to use the Disney Plus Party?
second.subHeading: If you're new to the Disney Plus party scene and want to discover how to host a watch party on Disney Plus, you've come to the right spot. Here, we provide a step-by-step guide to help you kickstart your Disney Plus party experience, ensuring a fun and enjoyable viewing time with friends and family. So, let’s get started:

accordian.question: Installation
accordian.answer: First of all, please install the extension on your Chromebook, Windows, macOS devices. Moreover, to install the extension, please Click here All the users are suggested to use Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge browsers.

accordian.question: Pin the extension to the toolbar
accordian.answer: Open the “extension” icon from the toolbar. Now, all the available extension options will open on this screen. From here, add the extension to the toolbar by clicking on the pin button.

accordian.question: Signing in to the Disney account
accordian.answer: It is necessary for all the users to have a Disney subscription, and to join or create a Disney Party, you need to log in to your Disney account.

accordian.question: Search and Play a video
accordian.answer: If you want to create a party, you will have to search and play a show that you want to stream at the party.

accordian.question: Host or Create a Disney Party
accordian.answer: After playing the video, go to the DP button located at the toolbar. Press the DP button (Disney Plus Party icon) and select the “Start a Party” option to generate the virtual party code/link. Furthermore, you need to share this link or code with everyone you want to invite to the party. Note: To have complete control of the watch party, please keep the “only I have control” switch enabled.

accordian.question: Join a watch party
accordian.answer: Visit the watch party link shared with you by your friend. If you have not installed the extension, you will be required to install it and log in to the Disney account.

three.heading: Features of Disney Plus Watch Party
three.subHeading: Similar to other streaming platforms, Disney Plus Party offers a range of exceptional features that can elevate your movie night experience. Installing the Disney Plus Watch Party extension enables access to these exciting features. Explore the information below to delve into the features of Disney Plus Watch Party:

accordian.question: Watch Disney in sync
accordian.answer: One of the greatest features of the extension is, it helps you watch Disney shows in perfect synchronization with people from all across the world.

accordian.question: User-friendly
accordian.answer: This is a user-friendly extension that anybody can use to create or join the watch parties easily.

accordian.question: Live Chat
accordian.answer: The chat feature of the extension enables the users to text or share emojis with each other while watching the shows.

accordian.question: Customize the Disney Plus Party profile
accordian.answer: Customize your watch party profile. Use funny avatars of your choice as your profile icon. In addition to that, choose your username or nickname. The username and icon will be visible to your friends.

accordian.question: Worldwide access
accordian.answer: Disney Watch Party extension is available all across the world. Therefore, Disney subscribers living in different locations can install and use the extension from anywhere.

accordian.question: What is the use of the Disney Plus Party extension?
accordian.answer: The extension is a helpful tool for all the Disney Plus subscribers who live far away from their loved ones and miss watching Disney Plus shows together. With the Disney Plus Party extension, you can create or join online watch parties with people from different locations.

accordian.question: How to install the extension?
accordian.answer: You can install the extension by clicking here. You will be redirected to the installation page, where you need to select the “Add to Chrome” option and then tap on the “Add Extension” button. However, before proceeding with the installation procedure, please make sure that you use Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge browsers. In addition to that, also remember that the extension only works with the Chromebook, Windows, or macOS laptop and PC.

accordian.question: Can I also chat with friends while streaming?
accordian.answer: Yes, you can chat with your friends during the watch party. The Disney Watch Party opens a sidebar while streaming the shows in sync. Thus, the users can chat with each other during the watch party.

accordian.question: What are the steps to host a watch party?
accordian.answer: Please follow the below steps to host or create the virtual party via this extension:- Install and add the extension to the toolbar for your browser.
accordian.p1: Sign in to your Disney account and play any show you would like to watch with your friends at the virtual party.
accordian.p2: After playing the video, go to the browser’s toolbar and then click on the Disney Plus Party icon- (DP button).
accordian.p3: It will open the next window where you can create your Disney plus party link.
accordian.p4: Here, select the “start a party” button to generate the watch party URL.
accordian.p5: You need to copy this link and share it with everyone you want to invite to the party.

accordian.question: What are the requirements to install the Disney Plus Party extension?
accordian.answer: The users must remember the following points before installing the extension: –
accordian.p1: They must have a stable internet connection.
accordian.p2: The extension can be installed in a Chromebook, macOS, or Windows laptop and computer. Therefore, you must have these devices to install the extension.
accordian.p3: Disney Plus Party extension can be installed via Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge browsers.
accordian.p4: The users must have a Disney Plus subscription.

footer.anyQuestions: Have questions? Visit our support page
